sentences.english: In a bowl, combine the water, brown sugar, soy sauce, apple juice.

sentences.english: Of policy measures is eat crab after a drink ginger hot red-sugar water.

sentences.english: Can also be boiled on the water, eat a bowl of eggs, brown sugar , red dates.

sentences.english: In a small bowl, mix together the chicken broth , soy sauce and brown sugar. Set aside.

sentences.english: Traditional Brown Sugar is a black color, moist and traditional sugar.
